name: John Doe
description: John is responsible for leading and managing the overall club, ensuring that it runs smoothly and that all members are engaged and productive.

name: Jane Smith
description: Jane is responsible for organizing and managing events and activities for the club. This includes scheduling, logistics, and outreach to members.

name: Mike Johnson
description: Mike is responsible for promoting the club and its events to the wider community. This can include social media, flyers, and other promotional materials.

name: Samantha Lee
description: Samantha is responsible for overseeing the technical aspects of the club, including website development, app development, and other technical projects.

name: David Kim
description: David is responsible for providing guidance and support to club members who need help with their technical skills or professional development.

name: Emily Chen
description: Emily is responsible for creating visual designs for the club's website, social media accounts, and other promotional materials.

name: Tom Wilson
description: Tom is responsible for reaching out to potential partners, sponsors, and collaborators to expand the club's network and resources.

name: Linda Nguyen
description: Linda is an ordinary member of the club, participating in various club activities and contributing to the club's mission.
